item-hint1.name: Hint x1
item-hint1.desc: You can view the hint once.

item-hint3.name: Hint x3
item-hint3.desc: You can view the hint three times.

item-timestop.name: Time Stop
item-timestop.desc: Pauses the arena timer for 30 seconds.

intro.ask: Press a button to check what you want to know!

shop.question: How do I buy items in the shop?
shop.answer: Go to the Shop tab, select the item you want, and press Buy.

roulette.question: How do I spin the roulette?
roulette.answer: Go to the Roulette tab and press START to spin and get rewards.

inventory.question: How do I use items in inventory?
inventory.answer: Go to the Inventory tab and press Use on the item you want to use.

coin.question: How can I get coins?
coin.answer: You can earn coins by solving problems, participating in events, etc.
